short_description: soulscape allgäu is a psychologists & counseling services provider based in kempten (allgäu), germany.
long_description: ein herzliches willkommen auf meiner homepage. im therapeutischen bereich erwarten dich professionelle psychotherapie, natur-resilienz-training, beratung und coaching basierend auf wissenschaftlich fundierten therapiemethoden, revolutionären tools und ganz viel herzblut. dabei kombiniere ich klassische verfahren wie kognitive verhaltenstherapie, schematherapie, lösungsorientierte kurzzeitherapie und gesprächspsychotherapie mit modernen konzepten der akzeptanz- & commitment -therapie,. im zentrum meiner motivation stehst du. mit der bitte um etwas geduld, melde ich mich schnellstmöglich zurück. wichtiger hinweis (nur) für neupatient*innen (!).
business_tags: counselling & coaching | inner child work | acceptance commitment therapy | cognitive behavioral therapy | clinical psychology | systemic therapy | mindfulness and meditation | forensic psychiatry | coaching & therapy | boot camp | resilience training | therapeutic area | joint appointments | meditation & yoga
generated_description: soulscape is a psychotherapy practice based in kempten (allgäu), bavaria. the company offers professional psychotherapy, nature resilience training, counseling, and coaching services. their approach combines traditional methods such as cognitive-behavioral therapy, schema therapy, and solution-focused brief therapy with modern concepts like acceptance and commitment therapy, positive psychology, and self-empowerment. the practice is led by silke marie schmidt, a licensed psychotherapist with extensive experience in various therapeutic settings. soulscape emphasizes a high level of empathy, resource orientation, and a friendly, non-judgmental relationship with clients.
generated_business_tags: self-empowerment and positive change | nature resilience training | cognitive behavioral therapy | short-term solution-oriented psychotherapy | counseling and coaching services | scientifically grounded therapies | yoga & mindfulness | acceptance and commitment | schema focused therapist
